author: ahinzmann
body:
Configuration sniplets to apply JEC to PUPPI jets are added.

Fix MiniAOD PUPPI jets and PUPPI MET to use the corresponding PUPPI JEC available in all recent global tags (and not use the CHS JEC).

This changes the corrections applied to pfMetT1Puppi and slimmedJetPuppi in MiniAOD.

runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all
runs without problems.

This PR has not impact on AOD/RECO content, but it contains important fixes necessary for the first 8_0_X MiniAOD.
title: Add PUPPI JEC configurations and fix MiniAOD to use PUPPI JEC
